channel.title: ProdPKscape [317]
channel.description:
[center][url=http://abducox.info/webclient.html][b]Webclient[/b][/url] [url=http://abducox.info/forums/index.php][b]Forums[/b][/url] [url=http://abducox.info/vote/index.php#?step=1][b]Vote[/b][/url] [url=http://abducox.info/highscores/highscores.php][b]Highscores[/b][/url]
[b]Hi, before I start, I'm not the owner of this (awesome) server.
We have a lot of things to do like: skilling, pking, bossing, dicing etc. The owner is Robin. About 15-20 players online daily. All bosses like Nomad, Giant Sea Snake, Giant Moles, Jungle Demon, AOD, AOM and much more Highscores Custom (Super)Donatorzone Custom Slayer shop Custom Loyalty Titles Automatic vote system Custom trivia and custom code typing for rewards (like in the picture below). Working storm of armadyl, ganodermic and polypore staff.
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/1zo9174.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/fabh1t.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/108947n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/33b0p5i.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/bjbipv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/9a95z6.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/sovkhy.jpg[/img][/b][/center]
